name: contingency_title_report_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will you remove the Preliminary Title Report contingency?
label: Title Report Days
description: Regardless of your answer, you will always have up to 5 days after receiving a document to review it.
tips: The preliminary title report review period helps identify any title issues or concerns. The standard timeline for review is 17 days after offer acceptance, but you will have up to 5 days after receiving the report to review it.
small_print: The preliminary title report will be ordered shortly after mutual acceptance and delivered to the buyer for review. The 5-day review period begins when you receive the title report, regardless of the removal deadline. Reviewing title can be done without professional help, but consulting an attorney for guidance and/or clarification during your review may be helpful.
